alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Carroll; Cass; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:23AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Miami, southeastern Johnson, northern Cass, Ray, Carroll, southeastern Caldwell, Lafayette, Jackson and northwestern Johnson Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 623 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Braymer to near Independence to Spring Hill. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Overland Park, Olathe, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Leawood, Raytown, Grandview, Belton, Raymore, Grain Valley, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Oak Grove, Richmond, Spring Hill, Odessa, Greenwood and Higginsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 11 and 47. Interstate 470 between mile markers 0 and 16. Interstate 435 between mile markers 66 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Carroll; Cass; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Ray
